main_features.name: Web Scraping Engine
main_features.description: Scrapes the index of EU funding opportunities, extracts PDF links, and validates URLs.

main_features.name: Database Management
main_features.description: Manages a PostgreSQL database to store call for tenders data.

main_features.name: Dashboard
main_features.description: Provides an interface to monitor system status, scraping statistics, and analysis results.

corrective_actions.issue: Validation Error: cannot import name 'CallCre' from 'app.schemas'
corrective_actions.solution: Correct the import statement to use the correct class name from the app.schemas module.
